testsuite.name: Communication Hub behaviour tests..Test basic setup.

testcase.classname: Communication Hub behaviour tests..Test basic setup.
testcase.name: should successfuly register a module along with an event and a handler

testsuite.name: Communication Hub behaviour tests..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.

testcase.classname: Communication Hub behaviour tests..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should trigger a handler once an event is broadcasted

testcase.classname: Communication Hub behaviour tests..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should pass on an event name and data, sent along with triggered event, to a handler

testcase.classname: Communication Hub behaviour tests..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should route an event to process associated data invisibly, and pass everything on to a handler

testcase.classname: Communication Hub behaviour tests..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should route an event to process associated data and respond back to a handler with modified data

testcase.classname: Communication Hub behaviour tests..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should not route an event, if there is no modules registered in the CommunicationHub, for that event
